title: Form, "M&Co: Fax Cover Set", 1984–85
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Four fax cover sheets, imprinted in black on white coated paper, comprise the set.

1993-151-378a - In the upper half of the page on the left, a M&Co FAX form is imprinted. The design of the remaining page is composed of: Cheers from M&Co, imprinted to the right of center close to the top of the page; M&Co New York, imprinted in a curved format on the lower left; and telephone, FAX and address information in five lines centered directly underneath.

1993-151-378b - In the upper half of the page on the left, a M&Co FAX form is imprinted. The design of the remaining page is composed of: Hello?, imprinted to the left of center close to the top of the page; How are you?, imprinted in a curved format to the right of center, a short distance underneath; Cheers from M&Co, imprinted in a curved format on the lower left; and telephone, FAX and address information in five lines centered directly underneath.

1993-151-378c - In the upper half of the page on the left, a M&Co FAX form is imprinted. The design of the remaining page is composed of Hello?, imprinted to the left of center close to the top of the page; Is anybody there?, imprinted to the right of center, a short distance underneath; Cheers from M&Co, imprinted in a curved format on the lower left; and telephone, FAX and address information in five lines centered directly underneath.

1993-151-358d - On the upper left is a line illustration of two boys, each holding one end of a tin-can-and-string play telephone. An above-the-waist view of the boy, facing right, in the upper left hand corner, shows him holding a can to his mouth; a taut string attached to the can stretches diagonally upward to the right, where it is attached to a second tin can, also held by a boy, facing the viewer and standing, to his ear. In the upper half of the page, below the first boy, are twenty-two lines of instructions for making a can-and-string telephone, accompanied by an illustration in the lower half. The center section is imprinted top to bottom with horizontal broken lines; FAX directions are imprinted on lines five to ten and on the bottom line. In the upper right hand corner, M&Co A Design Group, Inc. is followed underneath by four lines of address and telephone information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Form, "M&Co: Fax Cover Set", 1984–85.
1984–85. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-378.
